paper_abstract: Mathematical expressions have been developed for correlating experimental gas-to-olive oil, gas-to-saline solution, and saline solution-to-olive oil partition coefficients at 310 K with the Goss modified version of the Abraham model. The derived correlations were found to back-calculate the three sets of partition coefficients to better than 0.18 log units. Training set and test set analyses were used to validate each derived correlation.
paper_title: Mathematical correlations for gas-to-olive oil, gas-to-saline solution, and saline solution-to-olive oil partition coefficients based on the Goss modified Abraham model
